name: Maddineni Abhilash
summary: Having 9+ years of hands-on experience as DevOps Engineer in software configuration & release management, deploying software, automation & control environment management activities in Web-based and mobile applications.

education.institution: Oxford Public School, Guntur – Andhra Pradesh

projects.title: The Himalaya Drug Company
projects.description: Created and implemented the agile methodologies to the Himalaya Applications, maintaining more than 80+ applications in-house and Global Applications in different Environments, created the QA and UAT Environments, implemented VSTS, and managed major releases.

projects.title: InvestCorp
projects.description: Created VM’s from VMWare, applied security policies on web servers, created pipelines using Azure DevOps for CI/CD applications, and managed user administration.

projects.title: Stone River, Inc.
projects.description: Maintained agile methodologies, created QA, UAT, PROD environments, migrated from TFS to VSTS, and managed application releases.
